Item.Description: This auction is for a gently used Apple IPhone 4S 16gb used on Sprint's Network.  I bought this phone in March 2013 and used it the entire time with a case and a screen protector on the phone.  The phone literally has not a single scratch or blemish on it....absolutely PERFECT condition!!!  I'm selling it because my employer decided to get me (and many others) a new phone and is generously taking care of our bills as well!!!  Awesome right!?!?  Anyways, this phone is in like new condition and comes in it's original box with all original manuals.  It does NOT, however, come with a charger (keeping it for a different business IPhone....I'm really not that important) or earbuds.  So the auction is just for the IPhone and original box/manuals.  I have sold many things on EBAY and have never received any negative feedback so please bid with confidence and feel free to ask any questions.  Shipping is $15.00 and I only accept PAYPAL payments.  Also, serious bidders only please.  Good Luck!!!!
Item.Title: Apple iPhone 4S - 16GB - Black (Sprint) Smartphone PERFECT CONDITION!!!!
